Watson, the Labour George Osborne , called into question David Cameron 's judgement. ''This is the second job that Andy Coulson has resigned from for something he claims to know nothing about,'' Mr Watson said. His departure creates serious questions over the Prime Minister's judgment and points to the need for a deeper investigation into the affairs of Rupert Murdoch 's News Corp..
